MS MCQs

    Enable asynchronous messaging in Java apps by using JMS and Azure Service Bus

    »

    1. What is Java Message Service (JMS) 2.0?

      An SDK that I can add as a dependency to my Java application.

      An API that enables Java applications to communicate with enterprise messaging brokers.

      An Azure product or service.


    2. Where can you use JMS with Azure Service Bus?

      POJOs

      Spring Boot

      Java EE

      All of the above


    3. What Spring Boot object do you need to send or receive a JMS message?

      Message

      Session

      JmsTemplate


    4. From which of the following JMS message brokers can you lift and shift existing Java applications to Azure Service Bus?

      Active MQ

      IBM MQ

      TIBCO EMS

      All of the above/any JMS message broker
